mapper.insert: insert into store (id, user_id, name, description, thumbnail_image_url, thumbnail_image_alt) values ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{thumbnailImageUrl}, #{thumbnailImageAlt} )
mapper.select: select id, sub_category_id as subCategoryId, name, price, description, discount_rate as discountRate, discount_price as discountPrice, thumbnail_image_url as thumbnailImageUrl, thumbnail_image_alt as thumbnailImageAlt, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt from product where store_id=#{id}
